title: PBE ID
body:
User playing PBE server
The ID is **[REDACTED]**
Suddenly the server is not working.
Please create a new ID or recover your ID ...

replies.body: I wasn't able to find an account associated with that name. Can you provide a few more details of what you're experiencing?

I took a look at the account before I had to edit your posts to remove identifying information, but it looks like this account was part of the old PBE system, which were accounts not linked to live accounts. These accounts were *permanently deactivated* shortly after moving to our new PBE system. You can [apply for access to the new system](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) if you'd like to access the PBE again, otherwise please let me know if you have any other questions.
Nope, those accounts aren't part of the new PBE system, so you'll want to apply for PBE access in the new system with the link I provided in my last reply. ^.^

My account is a **[REDACTED]**.
Suddenly changed to dormant account
